S. Santini
dcterms:description: The ECO data set includes 1 Hz electricity usage measured by smart meters and occupancy labels gathered through a tablet computer and a passive infrared sensor. The data set is sampled with a sampling rate of 15 minutes and consists of 2700 samples, each a vector with a length of 96.
dcterms:title: ECO Data Set
